answers.answer: I am sorry that you are having these problems right now.  This is exactly what can make anxiety/panic so scary in my opinion.  It tends to confuse us, we lose self identity and often spiral downwards when we do not know what is going on.  Assuming you have been to see a doctor about this and gotten cleared medically in the past, the next step to getting better is through understanding of your anxiety.  In my experience with this, gaining the knowledge gives you the power to really experience relief from this.  Have you talked to a therapist about this? Keep us posted.
yea and she thinks its all anxiety, but the way that i feel im not sure anymore

Hello  it could be anxiety related but it could also be low blood sugar. i am an RN and those are some signs of hypo or hyper gylcemic reaction. I would think hypo since you feel better when you eat. Have you ever had your sugar checked? Does Diabetes run in your family?? It wouldnt hurt to have your sugar checked.Just a thought!
well diabetes dont run in my family, but i did go for a low blood sugar test today, ill get the results on tuesday. what could cause hypo anyhow ?

Usually you are a diabetic with Type 1 or 2 and then you get the hypo that comes along with it.  I have heard of people who just strictly have low blood sugar. I worked with a nurse that has just low blood sugar so she would have to eat 6 small high carb meals a day to keep her blood sugar up. I hope it all checks out ok!
thanks ito hope every thing is ok

question: im having lots of problems, it seems like my anxiety is getting worst or its not really anxiety. for the past three days ive been getting some bad shaking and dizziness, also some funny feelings in my head, (not able to explain), im not sure but it seem to ease up when i eat. i really would like some kind of advice, it seem like every day its getting worst, and i always feel like im going to die, sometimes when im feeling like this i look in the mirror and my face looks like im very sick, is this normal im realy scared. please anyone out there please respond
title: something feels wrong
